Structs/UINotificationCallbackAction.htm.name: callback
Structs/UINotificationCallbackAction.htm.abstract: The callback to trigger on the tap of a notification.

Structs/UINotificationCallbackAction.htm.name: execute()
Structs/UINotificationCallbackAction.htm.abstract: The callback to trigger on the tap of a notification.

Structs/UINotificationCallbackAction.htm.name: UINotificationCallbackAction
Structs/UINotificationCallbackAction.htm.abstract: Defines a notification action which can be instantiated with a callback to execute.

Protocols/UINotificationSchedulableDismi.name: schedule()
Protocols/UINotificationSchedulableDismi.abstract: Schedules the dismiss trigger to let the notification animate out after the displayDuration.

Protocols/UINotificationSchedulableDismi.name: cancel()
Protocols/UINotificationSchedulableDismi.abstract: Cancels the possibly scheduled dismiss trigger. Can be used for interactive gestures like a pan.

Protocols/UINotificationStyle.html#/s:vP.name: height
Protocols/UINotificationStyle.html#/s:vP.abstract: The height of the notification which applies on the notification view.

Protocols/UINotificationStyle.html#/s:vP.name: interactive
Protocols/UINotificationStyle.html#/s:vP.abstract: When true, the notification is swipeable and tappable.

Protocols/UINotificationAction.html.name: UINotificationAction
Protocols/UINotificationAction.html.abstract: Defines an action which can be executed with a notification on tap.

Protocols/UINotificationStyle.html.name: UINotificationStyle
Protocols/UINotificationStyle.html.abstract: Defines a style which will be applied on the notification view.

Protocols/UINotificationDismissTrigger.h.name: UINotificationDismissTrigger
Protocols/UINotificationDismissTrigger.h.abstract: A trigger which can be used to dismiss an UINotificationView.

Protocols/UINotificationSchedulableDismi.name: UINotificationSchedulableDismissTrigger
Protocols/UINotificationSchedulableDismi.abstract: A trigger which is schedulable and therefor cancelable.

Enums.html#/s:O15UINotifications20UINoti.name: UINotificationHeight
Enums.html#/s:O15UINotifications20UINoti.abstract: Defines the height which will be applied on the notification view.

Classes/UINotificationManualDismissTrigg.name: target
Classes/UINotificationManualDismissTrigg.abstract: A manual UINotificationDismissTrigger. Use trigger() to trigger the dismiss.

Classes/UINotificationManualDismissTrigg.name: trigger()
Classes/UINotificationManualDismissTrigg.abstract: Triggers the dismiss of the attached UINotificationView if presented.

Classes/UINotificationRequest.html#/s:vC.name: notification
Classes/UINotificationRequest.html#/s:vC.abstract: The notification which is requested for presentation.

Classes/UINotificationRequest.html#/s:vC.name: dismissTrigger
Classes/UINotificationRequest.html#/s:vC.abstract: Optional dismiss trigger to use for the animation. If nil the default trigger will be used.

Classes/UINotificationRequest.html#/s:ZF.abstract: An array of listener to delegate callbacks.

Classes/UINotificationPresentationContex.name: containerWindow
Classes/UINotificationPresentationContex.abstract: The window in which the UINotificationView will be presented.

Classes/UINotificationPresentationContex.name: notificationView
Classes/UINotificationPresentationContex.abstract: The UINotificationView containing the visual representation of the UINotification.

Classes/UINotificationPresentationContex.name: notification
Classes/UINotificationPresentationContex.abstract: Public getter for the current notification which is handled.

Classes/UINotificationPresentationContex.name: completePresentation()
Classes/UINotificationPresentationContex.abstract: Completes the presentation. Resets the container window and updates the state of the UINotificationRequest.

Classes/UINotification.html#/s:vC15UINot.name: style
Classes/UINotification.html#/s:vC15UINot.abstract: The style of the notification which applies on the notification view.

Classes/UINotification.html#/s:vC15UINot.name: action
Classes/UINotification.html#/s:vC15UINot.abstract: The action which will be triggered on tap.

Classes/UINotificationDurationDismissTri.name: target
Classes/UINotificationDurationDismissTri.abstract: A duration UINotificationDismissTrigger which will automatically dismiss the target UINotificationView after the given duration.

Classes/UINotificationDurationDismissTri.name: schedule()
Classes/UINotificationDurationDismissTri.abstract: The trigger which will make the target dismiss. Cancellable.

Classes/UINotificationDurationDismissTri.name: cancel()
Classes/UINotificationDurationDismissTri.abstract: The trigger which will make the target dismiss. Cancellable.

Classes/UINotificationEaseOutEaseInPrese.name: presentationContext
Classes/UINotificationEaseOutEaseInPrese.abstract: Presents the Notification with an EaseOut in animation, EaseIn out animation.

Classes/UINotificationEaseOutEaseInPrese.name: init(presentationContext:dismissTrigger:)
Classes/UINotificationEaseOutEaseInPrese.abstract: Presents the Notification with an EaseOut in animation, EaseIn out animation.

Classes/UINotificationEaseOutEaseInPrese.name: present()
Classes/UINotificationEaseOutEaseInPrese.abstract: Presents the Notification with an EaseOut in animation, EaseIn out animation.

Classes/UINotificationEaseOutEaseInPrese.name: dismiss()
Classes/UINotificationEaseOutEaseInPrese.abstract: Presents the Notification with an EaseOut in animation, EaseIn out animation.

Classes/UINotificationCenter.html#/s:vC1.name: presenterType
Classes/UINotificationCenter.html#/s:vC1.abstract: The type of presenter to use for presenting notifications. Change this to change the way notifications need to be presented.

Classes/UINotificationCenter.html#/s:vC1.name: notificationViewType
Classes/UINotificationCenter.html#/s:vC1.abstract: The type of view which will be used to present the notifications.

Classes/UINotificationEaseOutEaseInPrese.name: UINotificationEaseOutEaseInPresenter
Classes/UINotificationEaseOutEaseInPrese.abstract: Presents the Notification with an EaseOut in animation, EaseIn out animation.

Classes/UINotificationDurationDismissTri.name: UINotificationDurationDismissTrigger
Classes/UINotificationDurationDismissTri.abstract: A duration UINotificationDismissTrigger which will automatically dismiss the target UINotificationView after the given duration.

Classes/UINotification.html.name: UINotification
Classes/UINotification.html.abstract: An UINotification which can be showed on top of the UINavigationBar and UIStatusBar

Classes.html#/s:C15UINotifications18UINo.name: UINotificationView
Classes.html#/s:C15UINotifications18UINo.abstract: The default view which can be used for notification presentations.

Classes/UINotificationPresentationContex.name: UINotificationPresentationContext
Classes/UINotificationPresentationContex.abstract: Provides information about an in-progress notification presentation.

Classes/UINotificationRequest.html.name: UINotificationRequest
Classes/UINotificationRequest.html.abstract: Defines the request of a notification presentation.

Classes/UINotificationManualDismissTrigg.name: UINotificationManualDismissTrigger
Classes/UINotificationManualDismissTrigg.abstract: A manual UINotificationDismissTrigger. Use trigger() to trigger the dismiss.
